data.title: Jürgen Locadia
data.meta_description: The latest news, scores, highlights and stats from FC Cincinnati.
data.text:
2020 (FC Cincinnati): Made 17 appearances, including 15 starts, scoring one goal ... played 26 minutes as a second-half substitute and scored first career MLS goal in season opener at New York (March 1) ... led all FC Cincinnati players in total shots (4) and shots on goal (3) ... replaced Brandon Vazquez in the second half ... earned first MLS start and played 90 minutes at Atlanta (March 7) ... started and played 90 minutes vs D.C. United (Aug. 21) ... started and played 74 minutes against Chicago Fire FC (Aug. 25) ... was replaced by Brandon Vazquez in the second half ... started and played 90 minutes against Columbus Crew SC (Aug. 29) ... started and played 90 minutes against Chicago Fire FC (Sept. 2) ... won a team-high five fouls ... started and played 90 minutes against Columbus Crew SC (Sept. 6) and New York City FC (Sept. 12) ... started and played 90 minutes against New York Red Bulls (Sept. 19) ... led the team with five total shots ... started and played 90 minutes against Philadelphia Union (Sept. 23) ... led the team with four total shots and two key passes ... started and played 90 minutes at New York City FC (Sept. 26) ... started and played 90 minutes at Minnesota United FC (Oct. 3) ... recorded a single-game high seven shots ... started and played 75 minutes at the Philadelphia Union (Oct. 7) ... was replaced by Brandon Vazquez after picking up an injury ... was unavailable against Toronto FC (Oct. 11), Columbus Crew SC (Oct. 14) and D.C. United (Oct. 18) due to injury ... returned to the matchday roster and played 32 minutes as a second-half substitute against Minnesota United FC (Oct. 24) ... replaced Alvaro Barreal in the second half ... returned to the starting lineup and played 77 minutes against Sporting Kansas City (Oct. 28) ... co-led the team with four total shots ... replaced by Yuya Kubo in the second half ... started and played 90 minutes against Atlanta United FC (Nov. 1) ... co-lead the team with four shots ... started and played 90 minutes against Inter Miami CF (Nov. 8) ... MLS is Back Tournament: Made one appearance and scored one goal ... was unavailable for selection in group-stage matches against Columbus (July 11), Atlanta (July 16) and New York (July 22) because of an injury ... replaced Caleb Stanko in the 72nd minute in the Round of 16 match against Portland (July 28) ... scored from the penalty spot to tie the game ... had penalty attempt saved in the shootout.

2019-20 (Brighton & Hove Albion/TSG 1899 Hoffenheim): Made 14 appearances, including seven starts, scoring four goals and adding one assist across all competitions between Brighton & Hove Albion and TSG 1899 Hoffenheim â¦ joined TSG 1899 Hoffenheim on loan on Aug. 29, 2019 â¦ made Bundesliga debut against Bayern Leverkusen (Aug. 31), entering the match in the 62nd minute â¦ had first start and scored first goal in the Bundesliga against Hertha BSC (Oct. 26) â¦ scored in consecutive games against SC Paderborn (Nov. 1) and 1. FC KÃ¶ln (Nov. 8) â¦ scored against FC Augsburg (Dec. 13) â¦ logged an assist against Borussia Dortmund (Dec. 20).

2018-19 (Brighton & Hove Albion): Made 33 appearances, including 16 starts, scoring four goals and adding one assist across all competitionsâ¦ made first appearance of the season against Manchester United (Aug. 19) â¦ made first start of the season against Manchester City (Sept. 29) â¦ scored in consecutive games against Arsenal (Dec. 25) and the game-winner against Everton (Dec. 29) â¦ made 12 consecutive appearances from Dec. 8 against Burnley until Feb. 26 against Leicester â¦ made a single appearance in the EFL Cup against Southampton (Aug. 28) â¦ made six appearances, including three starts, scoring two goals and adding an assist in the FA Cup â¦ recorded an assist against Bournemouth (Jan. 15) â¦ recorded a goal in consecutive games, the game-winner against Derby County (Feb. 16) and against Millwall (March 17).

2017-18 (PSV Eindhoven/Brighton & Hove Albion): Made 26 appearances, including 23 starts, scoring 11 goals and adding eight assists across all competitions between PSV Eindhoven and Brighton & Hove Albion â¦ made 15 appearances, all starts, scoring nine goals and adding six assists in the Eredivisie â¦ recorded a goal and an assist against Roda JC (Aug. 27) â¦ recorded a game-winning assist against Feyenoord (Sept. 17) â¦ scored four goals and added an assist against FC Utrecht (Sept. 24) â¦ record a brace in the next game versus Willem II (Nov. 5) â¦ recorded a brace against Vitesse (Oct. 29) â¦ recorded a goal and an assist against FC Twente (Nov. 5) â¦ made two appearances, both starts, against NK Osijek (July 27 & Aug. 3) in Europa League Qualifying â¦ recorded an assist in lone KNVB Cup appearance against SDC Putten (Sept. 21) â¦ joined Brighton & Hove Albion on Jan. 19, 2018 â¦made six appearances, including three starts, scoring one goal and adding one assist in the Premier League â¦ scored in Premier League debut after entering the match in the 82nd minute against Swansea (Feb. 24) â¦ recorded an assist against Crystal Palace (April 14) â¦ made FA Cup debut against Coventry City (Feb. 17) and scored a goal.

2016-17 (PSV Eindhoven): Made 16 appearances, including 11 starts, scoring three goals and adding four assists across all competitions â¦ raised the Dutch Super Cup trophy after PSV defeated Feyenoord (July 31) â¦ recorded an assist in the season opener against FC Utrecht (Aug. 6) â¦ missed 19 straight games after suffering an injury â¦ recorded an assist against Roda JC (March 4) scored a goal in consecutive games against Sparta Rotterdam (April 1) and FC Twente (April 4) â¦ recorded an assist against ADO Den Haag (April 15) â¦ scored a goal against Ajax (April 23).

2015-16 (PSV Eindhoven): Made 42 appearances, including 38 starts, scoring 12 goals and adding 14 assists across all competitions â¦ raised the Dutch Super Cup trophy after PSV defeated FC Groningen (Aug. 2) â¦ won the Eredivisie Championship for a second consecutive season â¦ made 29 appearances, including 23 starts, scoring eight goals and adding 13 assistsin the Eredivisie â¦ scored first goal of the season against Feyenoord (Aug. 30) â¦ scored a brace against SC Cambuur (Sept. 12) â¦scored against NEC Nijmegen (Sept. 26) â¦ recorded an assist in five consecutive games against Ajax (Oct. 4), Excelsior (Oct. 17), FC Twente (Oct. 24), two assists against De Graafschap (Oct. 31) and FC Utrecht (Nov. 8) â¦ recorded an assist against PEC Zwolle (Dec. 19) â¦logged two assists against De Graafschap (Jan. 30) â¦ did not see the field against FC Utrecht (Feb. 7). after making 17 straight appearances â¦recorded a goal and added an assist against NEC Nijmegen (Feb. 14) â¦ scored a goal and registered an assist against FC Groningen (March 5) â¦ recorded both a goal and an assist against PEC Zwolle (May 8) â¦ made debut in the UEFA Champions League against Manchester United (Sept. 15), entering the match in the 85th minute â¦ made first Champions League start, going the full 90 minutes, against CSKA Moscow (Sept. 30) â¦ scored first Champions League goal against WfLWolfsburg (Nov. 3) â¦ made four appearances, all starts, scoring three goals and adding one assist in the KNVB Cup â¦ scored against SC Cambuur (Sept. 22) in the second round â¦ logged an assist against SC Genemuiden (Oct. 27) in the third round â¦ scored a brace and the game-winner against Heracles Almelo in the round of 16 (Dec. 16).

2014-15 (PSV Eindhoven): Made 36 appearances, including 15 starts, scoring nine goals and adding five assists across all competitions â¦ won the Eredivisie Championship with PSV â¦ started and scored in season opener against Willem II (Aug. 10) â¦ recorded a goal and an added an assist against NAC Breda (Aug. 16) â¦ recorded both a goal and an assist against Excelsior (Oct. 5) â¦ scored against Go Ahead Eagles (Dec. 20) â¦ recorded an assist against FC Dordrecht (Feb. 22) â¦ scored the game-winner in stoppage time against Excelsior (April 25) â¦ scored a goal and added an assist in the second leg of Europa League Qualifying against SKN St. PÃ¶lten (Aug. 7) â¦ made eight appearances, including five starts, in the Europa League â¦ scored a brace in the Third Round of the KNVB Cup against Almere City FC (Oct. 29).

2013-14 (PSV Eindhoven): Made 41 appearances, including 32 starts, scoring 17 goals and adding six assists across all competitions â¦ made 31 appearances, including 26 starts, scoring 13 goals and adding five assists in the Eredivisie â¦ logged three assists against NEC Nijmegen (Aug. 10) â¦scored first goal of the season against RKC Waalwijk (Oct. 26) â¦scored against NAC Breda (Nov. 10) â¦ recorded two assists against Vitesse (Dec. 7) â¦ scored against FC Utrecht (Dec. 15) .. recorded a brace and tallied game-winner in the next game against ADO Den Haag (Dec. 22) â¦ scored a goal in consecutive matches against SC Cambuur (Feb. 5) and FC Twente (Feb. 8) â¦ scored a goal in five consecutive games against Go Ahead Eagles (March 1), FC Utrecht (March 8), Vitesse (March 15), Roda JC (March 22) and FC Groningen (March 29) â¦scored against PEC Zwolle (April 27) â¦ made 23 straight appearances from Nov. 2, 2013 to May 3, 2014 â¦ scored against Zulte Waregem (July 30) in the first leg of the Third Round of the UEFA Champions League â¦made two appearances as a substitute in the Qualifying Round against AC Milan (Aug. 20 & Aug. 28) â¦made five appearances, all starts, in the Europa League â¦ added an assist against Chornomorets Odessa (Oct. 3) â¦ scored a hat-trick and game-winner against SC Telstar in the Second Round of the KNVB Cup.

2012-13 (PSV Eindhoven): Made 22 appearances, including 8 starts, scoring 11 goals and adding four assists across all competitionsâ¦ made 15 appearances, including four starts, scoring six goals and adding four assists in the Eredivisie â¦ made Eredivisie debut as a second-half substitute against VVV-Venlo (Sept. 30), scoring a hat-trick and adding an assist â¦ recorded an assist against Willem II (Oct. 20) â¦ made first Eredivisie start against PEC Zwolle (Oct. 28) â¦ recorded a goal and added an assist against ADO Den Haag (Feb. 2) â¦ played the full 90 minutes for the first time in Eredivisie career against VVV-Venlo (March 2) â¦ scored last goal of the season against NEC Nijmegen (May 5) â¦ made two appearances in the Europa League â¦ made Europa League debut against AIK (Nov. 8), entering the match in the 65th minute â¦ made five appearances, including four starts, scoring five goals in the KNVB Cup â¦ scored against Achilles â29 (Sept. 27) â¦ scored a hat-trick against PEC Zwolle (Feb. 27) in a 3-0 win in the KNVB Cup Semifinals â¦ scored in the loss of the KNVB Final against AZ Alkmaar (May 9).

2011-12 (PSV Eindhoven): Made two appearances, including one start, scoring one goal in the KNVB Cup as PSV were proclaimed championsâ¦ made debut in the Dutch Cup against VVSB Noordwijkerhout (Sept. 21) as a substitute in the 72nd minute and scored â¦ started and played the full 90 minutes against FC Lisse (Oct. 26) â¦ made the matchday roster for three separate occasions in the Europa League, but did not make an appearance.
